snippet: New Yorkers have a chance to prove to Bostonians what gracious winners they can be on a free trip. Or they can go lord it over the hapless beaneaters.
abstract: New Yorkers have a chance to prove to Bostonians what gracious winners they can be on a free trip. Or they can go lord it over the hapless beaneaters.

headline.main: Go to Loserville, Mayor Tells New Yorkers
